content: this scarf features a super simple slip_stitch pattern and faux i-cord edging plus with big needles you will fly through this knit quickly the texture is drape-y yet very cozy and the slightly more masculine fabric makes it a great unisex scarf **yarn ** 2 3 skeins or approximately 400m 600m of any 8ply/dk to 10ply/worsted weight yarn we used cascade 220 200m/100g **sizes ** normal large large size is pictured **dimesions ** 19cm x 157cm 26 5cm x 200cm approximately **needles ** 6mm needles if you are a tight knitter we recommend you go up a size as the fabric might curl if too dense **gauge ** 18 stitches and 30 row to 10cm in pattern
